operators.name: Take(3)
operators.description: emits only the first n items emitted by an Observable.

operators.name: Filter(even emissions)
operators.description: emit only those items from an Observable that pass a predicate test.

operators.name: Skip(3)
operators.description: suppress the first n items emitted by an Observable.

operators.name: Take Last(2)
operators.description: emits only the last n items emitted by an Observable.

operators.name: Map(it->it*2)
operators.description: transforms the items emitted by an Observable by applying a function to each item.

operators.name: Buffer(2)
operators.description: periodically gather items from an Observable into bundles and emit these bundles rather than emitting the items one at a time.
